mapper.insert: insert into diary(DiaryTitle, DiaryStart, DiaryEnd, DiaryContent, DiaryColor, memID) values(#{DiaryTitle}, #{DiaryStart}, #{DiaryEnd}, #{DiaryContent}, #{DiaryColor}, #{memID})
mapper.select: select * from log where logDate = #{logDate} and memID = #{memID}
mapper.delete: delete from diary where memID = #{memID} and DiaryTitle = #{DiaryTitle} and DiaryContent = #{DiaryContent} and DiaryStart = #{DiaryStart} and DiaryEnd = #{DiaryEnd}
